mapper.sql: id, account_id, amount, source, type, create_time, account_amount
mapper.insert: insert into t_acc_wallet_detail (id, account_id, amount, source, type, create_time, account_amount) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{source,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{accountAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update t_acc_wallet_detail set account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, source = #{source,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, type = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, account_amount = #{accountAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
